00014 @synthesize entry, webView, activityIndicator;
00015 
00016 - (EntryController *)initWithEntry:(Entry *)e {
00017         if (self = [super initWithNibName:@"EntryView" bundle:nil]) {
00018                 self.entry = e;
00019         }
00020         
00021         return self;
00022 }
00023 
00024 // Implement viewDidLoad to do additional setup after loading the view, typically from a nib.
00025 - (void)viewDidLoad {
00026     [super viewDidLoad];
00027         
00028         self.navigationItem.title = self.entry.name;
00029 
00030         NSString *urlAddress = [[NSString alloc] initWithFormat:@"http://compsci.ca/~rdrake/man/ubuntu-9.04%@", self.entry.path];
00031         NSURL *url = [NSURL URLWithString:urlAddress];
00032         NSURLRequest *req = [NSURLRequest requestWithURL:url];
00033         [webView loadRequest:req];
00034         
00035         // The URL address is no longer required.  The web view, however, still requires the URL object
00036         // as well as the request object.  It takes care of their garbage collection, not us.
00037         [urlAddress release];
00038 }
00039 
00040 // Override to allow orientations other than the default portrait orientation.
00041 - (BOOL)shouldAutorotateToInterfaceOrientation:(UIInterfaceOrientation)interfaceOrientation {
00042     // Return YES for supported orientations
00043     return (interfaceOrientation == UIInterfaceOrientationPortrait) ||
00044                 (interfaceOrientation == UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeLeft) ||
00045                 (interfaceOrientation == UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeRight);
00046 }

00051         
00052         // Release any cached data, images, etc that aren't in use.
00053 }

00055 - (void)viewDidUnload {
00056         // Release any retained subviews of the main view.
00057         // e.g. self.myOutlet = nil;
00058 }
00059 
00060 - (void)webViewDidStartLoad:(UIWebView *)wv {
00061         self.view = activityIndicator;
00062     [activityIndicator startAnimating];
00063 }
00064 
00065 - (void)webViewDidFinishLoad:(UIWebView *)wv {
00066         self.view = webView;
00067     [activityIndicator stopAnimating];
00068 }
00069 
00070 - (void)webView:(UIWebView *)wv didFailLoadWithError:(NSError *)error {
00071     [activityIndicator stopAnimating];
00072         
00073     if (error != NULL) {
00074         UIAlertView *errorAlert = [[UIAlertView alloc]
00075                                                                    initWithTitle: [error localizedDescription]
00076                                                                    message: [error localizedFailureReason]
00077                                                                    delegate:nil
00078                                                                    cancelButtonTitle:@"OK" 
00079                                                                    otherButtonTitles:nil];
00080         [errorAlert show];
00081         [errorAlert release];
00082     }
00083 }
00084 
00085 - (void)dealloc {
00086     [super dealloc];
00087         
00088         //[self.entry dealloc];
00089 }
